CustomField.description: This field is optional. When a Credit Memo Version is saved to Document Manager, the Id of the selected placeholder is populated into this field via Apex. It is used to display the most recently used placeholder in the Save Version modal.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Id of the most recently used placeholder in the Save Version modal. When populated, the modal displays the name of this placeholder as default.
CustomField.label: Linked Placeholder Id
